tiers.name: Bronze
tiers.subtitle: Visibility Partner
includes: Logo on homepage partner strip + click-through
tiers.bestFor: Equipment suppliers, regional contractors, service providers

tiers.name: Silver
tiers.subtitle: Traffic Partner
includes: 1 trackable CTA/month (discount code or landing page)
tiers.bestFor: Equipment manufacturers, training providers, insurance companies

tiers.name: Gold
tiers.subtitle: Lead + Authority
includes: In-app tile + dedicated partner block/category placement
1 activation/month (drill-of-week, short article, mini-module, webinar mention)
tiers.bestFor: Major equipment brands, large contractors, industry leaders

tiers.name: Title / Founding
tiers.subtitle: Category King
includes: Priority roadmap input for sponsor placements

addOns.name: Category Exclusivity
addOns.description: Exclusive category rights (e.g., "Exclusive Dive Computer Partner")

addOns.name: Extra Activation
addOns.description: Additional email/push/webinar mentions, co-branded content pieces

addOns.name: Recruitment Campaign
addOns.description: Job posting placements, recruitment-focused CTAs, access to candidate pipeline

foundingPartnerOffer.conversion: If it performs → convert to 6–12 month Silver/Gold at founder-locked pricing

website.name: Partner Directory Page
website.format: Full sponsor profiles with logos, descriptions

tracking: UTM parameters on all sponsor links

delivery.method: Email to sponsor contact + admin dashboard view

steps.name: Discovery Call
steps.description: Discuss goals, review tier options, answer questions, customize package

steps.name: Proposal & Agreement
steps.description: Receive customized proposal, review sponsor agreement, sign agreement, set start date

steps.name: Asset Collection
steps.description: Provide logo (SVG/PNG), share brand guidelines, submit landing URL, provide CTA text, share promo code

steps.name: Setup & Configuration
steps.description: Create UTM-tracked links, configure placements, set up tracking, test all placements

steps.name: Go Live
steps.description: Launch placements, verify tracking, send confirmation, begin reporting schedule

onboarding.totalTimeline: 10-15 business days from agreement to go-live
